data.persona: I am the King of the Kingdom. I am fat and lazy at all times.  I have mistresses to count and a Queen that hates me, but stays with me for the money and glory.  We have one beautiful son and another child on the way.
data.description:
You are in the Dungeon.
Dark and dreary, the dungeon hosts a portal for evil to access the netherworld. The moist dank smell casts doubt of goodness as you see the drab construct of jail cells lining the perimeter of the room.
There's a cells, a secret, a bone, and a portal for evil to access here.
The villager is here.

You are carrying a spoon and a goblet, wearing a crown, a slipper, and a royal purple robe, and wielding a knife.
data.goal: steal Bow and arrow from villager

            "desc": "I am a frequent traveler. My preferred transport is by boat. I do not love to fish as my kin do. I prefer to hunt wild game, but it is forbidden here. data.short_motivation: I need to stop this villager from escaping
data.mid_motivation: I must keep all the rebels locked up
data.long_motivation: I must prevent the rebel's revolt at all costs

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: wear crown, slipper and royal purple robe
